org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant

Class ReactorPoolThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant.ReactorPoolThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ReactorPoolThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Base class for pool threads used by reactors. Created by DefaultReactorPoolThreadFactory.
